title: lissandra needs some help.
body: Does anyone else think lissandra needs some help? honeslty i think roit needs to tweak her numbers a little and maybe make the passive better or completey change it. right now it's only good early game. If anyone out there agrees then plz post ideas here.

replies.body:
Honestly Lissandra is fine where she is at the moment, she brings huge teamfight to the team as well as good cc. Their are very few mages out there who have to actually get into people's faces to be efficient. Changing her would change her identity.

You don't need a initiation mage, and if you really want one you can just build her tanky. Lissandra is one of the few who can actually get into the backline

Yeah, Lissandra's passive could be improved somehow, but I feel she does have some very specific strengths, namely early game mana advantages and her lack of targeted spells except her ult which she can also self cast. Why is that helpful?

Shameless self-promotion time!

I address this very issue in [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/bMZAnPBY-lissandraslight-rework-proposal-new-passive-as-a-shift-towards-tanky-initiator).

I feel that Riot needs to shift Lissandra away from being another generic AoE nuker and instead give her the unique identity of initiator mage. There are very, very few initiator mages out there (Fiddlesticks and Swain are the main ones), so it's a very underutilised niche that Lissandra can fit right into. However, in order to do so, initiators need either tankiness or sustain to survive the first volley of cooldowns. Since sustain is common in the other initiator mages, I feel that making her tanky would be the best choice.

I think she moves very slowly and can't really secure a kill without relying on her ultimate. Her passive is nice, but it isn't where she needs to change. Ever since they nerfed the damage output on her W, its been increasingly hard to land kills. She's cripplingly short ranged, and can't effectively chase fleeing targets due to the slow speed of her E and her general lack of movement speed. Even adding something as simple as her Q applying slow to any hit target, and not just the first, would help her out tremendously.
